app_descript:
Brief: Amazon Fresh is an app that brings the convenience of grocery shopping right to your doorstep. Designed specifically for customers in the Seattle and Los Angeles metropolitan areas, this app marries the ease of mobile shopping with the quick delivery of fresh groceries, all secured through Amazon's trusted infrastructure. Experience shopping for fresh produce, daily essentials, and more, all at your fingertips with pricing in U.S. dollars.
